scripts.build: npm run build:ts && npm run build:static
scripts.build:static: npm run build:static:electron && npm run build:static:nw
scripts.build:static:nw: npm run build:static:nw:window && npm run build:static:nw:transparent
scripts.build:static:nw:window: shx mkdir -p dist/nw-window && shx cp src/nw-window/*.{html,json} dist/nw-window
scripts.build:static:nw:transparent: shx mkdir -p dist/nw && shx cp src/nw/*.{html,json} dist/nw
scripts.prepare:example: npm run prepare:example:ghost && npm run prepare:example:balloon
scripts.prepare:example:ghost: shx mkdir -p baseware/ghost && curl http://ikagaka.github.io/Ikagaka.demo/vendor/nar/ikaga.nar -o ikaga.nar && unzip -o -d baseware/ghost/ikaga ikaga.nar && shx rm ikaga.nar
scripts.prepare:example:balloon: shx mkdir -p baseware/balloon && curl http://ikagaka.github.io/Ikagaka.demo/vendor/nar/origin.nar -o origin.nar && unzip -o -d baseware/balloon/origin origin.nar && shx rm origin.nar
